name: Dragonborn
flavor: Proud and imposing, dragonborn carry the blood of dragons in their veins and strive to honor their draconic heritage.

name: Dwarf

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Combat Training
traits.desc: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.desc: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.desc: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

starting_proficiencies_options: Choose one of: Smith's tools, Brewer's supplies, or Mason's tools
flavor: Stout and steadfast, dwarves are renowned for their craftsmanship, resilience, and deep ties to tradition and the earth.

name: Elf

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.desc: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic cannot put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.desc: Elves do not need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

flavor: Graceful and perceptive, elves are long-lived beings with a deep connection to nature and magic.

name: Gnome

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

flavor: Inventive and curious, gnomes are quick-witted and excel in magic and trickery, always ready for a new adventure.

name: Half-Elf

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic cannot put you to sleep.

traits.name: Skill Versatility
traits.desc: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

starting_proficiencies_options: Choose two skills of your choice
languages: One extra language of your choice
flavor: Combining the best traits of both worlds, half-elves are adaptable, charismatic, and skilled in a variety of endeavors.

name: Half-Orc

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.desc: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. you cannot use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

traits.name: Savage Attacks
traits.desc: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

flavor: Powerful and resilient, half-orcs command respect on the battlefield, though they often wrestle with their dual heritage.

name: Halfling

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: You have advantage on saving throw against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.desc: When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

flavor: Small in stature but big in spirit, halflings are known for their optimism, resourcefulness, and knack for getting out of tight spots.

name: Human
starting_proficiencies_options: Variant: Choose one feat if using the Variant Human traits
languages: One extra language of your choice
flavor: Versatile and ambitious, humans are adaptable and driven to excel in a wide array of fields and endeavors.

name: Tiefling

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.desc: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.desc: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Infernal Legacy
traits.desc: You know the thaumaturgy cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the hellish rebuke spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the darkness spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

flavor: Born of infernal lineage, tieflings grapple with prejudice while harnessing their unique, otherworldly powers.
